title: Saturday Special with Michael Mulvihill
itunes:title: Saturday Special with Michael Mulvihill
description:
Colin is joined by Michael Mulvihill, FOX Sports EVP/Head of Strategy to talk about the XFL's early success, sports leagues thriving on TV while shows are struggling and the impact of streaming services like Netflix on the sports world. If you are interested in sports broadcasting this exclusive interview is a great listen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
